"},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Here's the result of running `cat -n` on Guide_API.md:
 1	Voici un **guide complet**, en français, pour intégrer efficacement les données climatiques et météorologiques dans votre application **React Native / Expo**, en utilisant **OpenEPI**, avec des **exemples de code** clés et des sources complémentaires pour valider (ou compléter) les données. Le tout s’appuie sur des API fiables pour construire la couche **intelligence météo / risque climatique** répondant aux besoins de Clim‑Invest.
 2	
 3	---
 4	
 5	## 1. Vue d’ensemble : architecture générale
 6	
 7	| Étape | Description | Technologies & API | Objectif |
 8	| ------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
 9	| **1.1** | Installation du client JavaScript OpenEPI | `npm install @openepi/client —save` | Facile accès aux endpoints via la lib JS officielle ([developer.openepi.io][1]) |
 10	| **1.2** | Récupération des données météo / climatiques | API OpenEPI (station, satellite, agrégation), Open‑Meteo, WIS2 Burkina | Alimenter historiques, temps réel, indices NDVI etc. |
 11	| **1.3** | Validation & réconciliation des données | Comparer OpenEPI ↔ données natives (Météo Burkina API WIS2) ou reanalyses Open‑Meteo (ERA5, IFS) | s’assurer de la cohérence, détecter divergences ou biais |
 12	| **1.4** | Calcul d’indices (NDVI, stress hydrique, ET) | Intégrer NDVI satellitaire + dérivés FAO‑56 ET₀ ou anomalies modulaires | Détecter alerte sécheresse/surdité pluies |
 13	| **1.5** | Dashboard client / tarification dynamique | Consommer données en fonction GPS via `navigator.geolocation` + GraphQL ou REST interne | Alertes temps‑réel, déclenchements auto‑indemnisation et prime dynamique |
 14	
 15	---
 16	
 17	## 2. Intégration OpenEPI dans Expo
 18	
 19	### 2.1. Installation
 20	
 21	```bash
 22	expo install @openepi/client
 23	```
 24	
 25	ou dans n’importe quelle app React ou React Native :
 26	
 27	```bash
 28	npm install @openepi/client
 29	```
 30	
 31	### 2.2. Authentification (combo expo‑secure‐store ou env)
 32	
 33	```ts
 34	// src/openepi.ts
 35	import OpenEpi from '@openepi/client';
 36	
 37	export const openEpi = new OpenEpi({
 38	 url: 'https://api.openepi.io', // URL de base (exemple)
 39	 apiKey: process.env.OPENEPI_API_KEY /* ou SecureStore */
 40	});
 41	```
 42	
 43	### 2.3. Appel de données (historique ou temps réel)
 44	
 45	```ts
 46	// fetch.js
 47	import { openEpi } from './openepi';
 48	import type { ClimateHistoricalResponse } from '@openepi/client';
 49	
 50	export async function fetchPrecipitationDaily(
 51	 lat: number,
 52	 lon: number,
 53	 begin: string, // 'YYYY‑MM‑DD'
 54	 end: string
 55	): Promise<number[]> {
 56	 const resp: ClimateHistoricalResponse = await openEpi.getHistorical({
 57	 variables: ['precipitation_sum', 'temperature_2m_min', 'temperature_2m_max'],
 58	 bbox: [lon - 0.1, lat - 0.1, lon + 0.1, lat + 0.1],
 59	 start: begin,
 60	 end: end
 61	 });
 62	 return resp.daily.precipitation_sum;
 63	}
 64	```
 65	
 66	### 2.4. Affichage dans un composant Expo
 67	
 68	```tsx
 69	// DashboardMeteo.tsx
 70	import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
 71	import { View, Text } from 'react-native';
 72	import * as Location from 'expo-location';
 73	import { fetchPrecipitationDaily } from './fetch';
 74	
 75	export default function DashboardMeteo() {
 76	 const [todayPrecip, setToday] = useState<number | null>(null);
 77	 useEffect(() => {
 78	 async function load() {
 79	 const { coords } = await Location.getCurrentPositionAsync();
 80	 const today = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10);
 81	 const data = await fetchPrecipitationDaily(coords.latitude, coords.longitude, today, today);
 82	 setToday(data[0] ?? 0);
 83	 }
 84	 load();
 85	 }, []);
 86	 return (
 87	 <View style={{ padding: 16 }}>
 88	 <Text style={{ fontSize: 18 }}>Pluie aujourd’hui: {todayPrecip} mm</Text>
 89	 </View>
 90	 );
 91	}
 92	```
 93	
 94	---
 95	
 96	## 3. Autres API complémentaires pour validation et fiabilité
 97	
 98	### 3.1. **Météo Burkina** (WIS2 in a box API)
 99	
 100	* Plateforme nationale interopérable avec WMO, propose accès à son réseau SYNOP, bords, analyses, via **OAPI** swagger ([wis2.meteoburkina.bf][2]).
 101	* Vous pouvez interroger en GET `/stations`, `/observations?station=…&start=…&end=…` pour obtenir des séries horaires certifiées.
 102	* Exemple validation : comparez précipitation journalière OpenEPI ↔ valeurs WIS2 pour une station au même intervalle.
 103	
 104	### 3.2. **Open‑Meteo (API libre)**
 105	
 106	* API libre, pas de clé pour usage non commercial, deux services utiles :
 107	
 108	 * **Climate API** : modèles CMIP6 de 1950 à 2050 à résolution 10 km (NDVI, température, vent, pluie) ([open-meteo.com][3])
 109	 * **Historical Weather API** (ERA5‑Land, ECMWF IFS reanalysis) pour obtenir des valeurs horaires/quotidiennes cohérentes depuis 1940 avec délai de 2‑5 jours ([open-meteo.com][3])
 110	* Pour validation : obtenez, pour les mêmes coords et dates, les pluies et comparez aux données OpenEPI. Le biais moyen devrait être ≤ ±10 % selon les études.
 111	
 112	### 3.3. **Centre AGRHYMET (CILSS / ECOWAS)**
 113	
 114	* Fournit cartes d’indice pluviométrique, stress hydrique, bulletins de suivi (via CropWatch, CHIRPS, etc.) pour les 17 pays du Sahel ([ccr1-agrhymet.cilss.int][4])
 115	* Leur système logiciel HYDROMET centralise pluies, vent, hydrologie — utile en cas d’écart important.
 116	* Diffusion publique souvent via bulletins PDF, mais un portail REST/OAPI est en cours (via AGRHYMET évènements de développement), demande d’accès possible.
 117	
 118	### 3.4. **Données de végétation NDVI (NASA / Copernicus / MOD13)**
 119	
 120	* La NASA publie des **NDVI** à base de données MODIS datant de 2000 à aujourd’hui, ainsi que des valeurs **anomalies** comparatives ([earthdata.nasa.gov][5]).
 121	* Exemple : utilisez l’API **NASA Earthdata STAC** ou **ClimateSERV OPeNDAP** pour charger NDVI gridded et calculer la moyenne sur une `bbox`.
 122	* Pour l’élevage ou les cultures sensibles à la sécheresse, une **anomalie NDVI négative** sur plusieurs semaines est un indice fort de stress hydrique.
 123	
 124	---
 125	
 126	## 4. Code React Native + Expo pour vérifier et réconcilier les données
 127	
 128	```ts
 129	import { openEpi } from './openepi';
 130	
 131	export async function validateData(lat: number, lon: number, date: string) {
 132	 const open = await openEpi.getHistorical({
 133	 variables: ['precipitation_sum', 'temperature_2m_max'],
 134	 bbox: [lon - 0.05, lat - 0.05, lon + 0.05, lat + 0.05],
 135	 start: date,
 136	 end: date
 137	 });
 138	
 139	 const meteobf = await fetch(
 140	 `https://wis2.meteoburkina.bf/oapi/observations?lat=${lat}&lon=${lon}&start=${date}&end=${date}`
 141	 ).then(r => r.json());
 142	
 143	 const meteoO = await fetch(
 144	 `https://archive-api.open-meteo.com/v1/archive?latitude=${lat}&longitude=${lon}&start_date=${date}&end_date=${date}&daily=precipitation_sum,temperature_2m_max`
 145	 ).then(r => r.json());
 146	
 147	 // Ex. de réconciliation simple :
 148	 const epiPrecip = open.daily.precipitation_sum[0];
 149	 const bfPrecip = meteobf[0]?.precipitation ?? null;
 150	 const omPrecip = meteoO.daily.precipitation_sum[0];
 151	
 152	 return {
 153	 open, bfPrecip, omPrecip,
 154	 epsilonOpiVsBF: (epiPrecip - bfPrecip) / bfPrecip,
 155	 epsilonOpiVsOM: (epiPrecip - omPrecip) / omPrecip
 156	 };
 157	}
 158	```
 159	
 160	Intégrez cette fonction dans un hook `useValidate(date, lat, lon)` pour afficher à l’utilisateur un état de **cohérence des données** (⚠️ divergences > 20 % : signal d’alerte ou enquête manuelle).
 161	
 162	---
 163	
 164	## 5. Indicateurs spécifiques & modélisation dynamique
 165	
 166	* Calculez l’**ET₀ (évapotranspiration de référence)** via FAO‑56 depuis variables OpenEPI / Open‑Meteo (température, humidité, vent, radiation solaire).
 167	* Utilisez les données récemment téléchargées pour :
 168	
 169	 * Déterminer le nombre de **jours sans pluie > x mm** (sécheresse en germination)
 170	 * Analyser des **anomalies NDVI** (via NASA) pour détecter zones asséchées
 171	 * Définir seuils de déclenchement d’alerte / indemnisation
 172	
 173	Dans React Native, stockez les données historisées dans un **Contexte / Redux state**, puis des fonctions calculent les indices pour le dashboard ou les alertes.
 174	
 175	---
 176	
 177	## 6. Optimisation Expo : mise à jour et localisation
 178	
 179	* Utilisez `expo-location` pour obtenir les **coordonnées GPS de l’utilisateur agriculteur** et charger les données pour dix premiers kilomètres autour → **taille de BBOX flexible** selon densité data.
 180	* Configurez un **fetch régulier** (ex. avec `setInterval`, ou en tâche background) toutes les 4 heures pour les prévisions/pluies :
 181	
 182	 * Omettre si l’utilisateur n’est plus connecté au Wi‑Fi ou batterie faible.
 183	
 184	---
 185	
 186	## 7. Visualisation & UX
 187	
 188	* Utilisez des bibliothèques comme **Victory**, **Reanimated Chart**, **react-native-svg** pour tracer :
 189	
 190	 * Séries journalières de précipitations
 191	 * NDVI vs moyenne historique
 192	 * Graphiques d’alerte précalculés (zones gris = pluie, rouge = stress humides)
 193	
 194	Affichez un petit **widget avertissement météo** avec messages type :
 195	
 196	* *« Alerte sécheresse ! Pluies records absentes depuis 28 jours (0,5 mm en moyenne). Compensé : anomalie NDVI = −25 % »*
 197	* *« Précipitation détectée demain (modèles climatiques), déclenchement possible de couverture »*
 198	
 199	---
 200	
 201	## 8. Bonnes pratiques & assignations juridiques
 202	
 203	* Respectez les licences d’attribution :
 204	
 205	 * Open EPI : CC‑BY‑4.0 (attribuez la source)
 206	 * Open‑Meteo / CMIP6 : usage non commercial autorisé, mentionner « Open‑Meteo (CMIP6 models) », citer les sources, mention limité à usage non commercial ([open-meteo.com][3]).
 207	 * Météo Burkina / WIS2 : suivre le modèle TCP/IP ou MoU, faire figurer emblème ANAM.
 208	 * NASA / Copernicus : CC‑BY (NDVI) → inclure crédits NASA, identifier la collection (ex. « MODIS/Terra NDVI, NASA 2024 »).
 209	* Gérer les quotas API (OpenEPI vous attribue des clés à débit limité). Utilisez un service proxy serveur ou cache (Redis) pour limiter les appels en période de forte charge.
 210	* Documentez les **seuils de qualité** : `error_ratio > 0.2` enseignant flag interne, déclencheur d’examen manuel de sinistre.
 211	
 212	---
 213	
 214	## 9. Résumé rapide
 215	
 216	En combinant :
 217	
 218	* la **librairie JavaScript OpenEPI**, l’API **WIS2 Burkina**, l’API **Open‑Meteo** et compléments satellitaires de **NASA / AGRHYMET**,
 219	* vous obtenez :
 220	
 221	 * des données météo locales et certifiées (pluie, vent, pression, radiation),
 222	 * des **indices NDVI et ET₀** utiles à la détection de stress hydrique,
 223	 * un mécanisme de **validation croisée** permettant de détecter les écarts de données,
 224	 * des **triggers automatiques** pour alerter l’utilisateur ou déclencher une indemnisation,
 225	 * une **tarification dynamique** selon le risque climatique local.
 226	
 227	---
 228	
 229	
 230	---
 231	
 232	Ce plan vous fournit une base robuste pour construire la **couche climat intelligence** de Clim‑Invest. N’hésitez pas à me demander des extensions de code (ex. calcul d’indice ET₀, affichage carte via Leaflet React Native, ou modèle machine‑learning pour la prédiction de rendement à partir du NDVI).
 233

} from 'axios';\nimport { ENV_CONFIG } from '../config/env';\n\nexport interface ClimateHistoricalResponse {\n daily: {\n precipitation_sum: number[];\n temperature_2m_min: number[];\n temperature_2m_max: number[];\n relative_humidity_2m: number[];\n wind_speed_10m: number[];\n };\n hourly?: {\n temperature_2m: number[];\n precipitation: number[];\n relative_humidity_2m: number[];\n };\n}\n\nexport interface OpenEpiParams {\n variables: string[];\n bbox: [number, number, number, number]; // [lon_min, lat_min, lon_max, lat_max]\n start: string; // 'YYYY-MM-DD'\n end: string; // 'YYYY-MM-DD'\n}\n\nclass OpenEpiService {\n private client: AxiosInstance;\n private accessToken: string | null = null;\n\n constructor() {\n this.client = axios.create({\n baseURL: ENV_CONFIG.OPENEPI_BASE_URL,\n timeout: 30000,\n headers: {\n 'Content-Type': 'application/json',\n },\n });\n\n // Intercepteur pour ajouter le token d'authentification\n this.client.interceptors.request.use(async (config) => {\n if (!this.accessToken) {\n await this.authenticate();\n }\n if (this.accessToken) {\n config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${this.accessToken}`;\n }\n return config;\n });\n\n // Intercepteur pour g\u00e9rer l'expiration du token\n this.client.interceptors.response.use(\n (response) => response,\n async (error) => {\n if (error.response?.status === 401) {\n this.accessToken = null;\n await this.authenticate();\n // Retry la requ\u00eate originale\n return this.client.request(error.config);\n }\n return Promise.reject(error);\n }\n );\n }\n\n private async authenticate(): Promise<void> {\n try {\n const response = await axios.post(`${ENV_CONFIG.OPENEPI_BASE_URL}/auth/token`, {\n client_id: ENV_CONFIG.OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID,\n client_secret: ENV_CONFIG.OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET,\n grant_type: 'client_credentials'\n });\n\n this.accessToken = response.data.access_token;\n console.log('\u2705 OpenEPI authentification r\u00e9ussie');\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur authentification OpenEPI:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de s\\'authentifier avec OpenEPI');\n }\n }\n\n async getHistorical(params: OpenEpiParams): Promise<ClimateHistoricalResponse> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/climate/historical', {\n params: {\n variables: params.variables.join(','),\n bbox: params.bbox.join(','),\n start_date: params.start,\n end_date: params.end,\n format: 'json'\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur r\u00e9cup\u00e9ration donn\u00e9es OpenEPI:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les donn\u00e9es climatiques');\n }\n }\n\n async getCurrentWeather(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<any> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/weather/current', {\n params: {\n latitude: lat,\n longitude: lon\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur m\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle OpenEPI:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer la m\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle');\n }\n }\n\n async getForecast(lat: number, lon: number, days: number = 7): Promise<any> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/weather/forecast', {\n params: {\n latitude: lat,\n longitude: lon,\n days: days\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur pr\u00e9visions OpenEPI:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les pr\u00e9visions');\n }\n }\n}\n\n// Instance singleton\nexport const openEpiService = new OpenEpiService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 3. AxiosInstance } from 'axios';\nimport { ENV_CONFIG } from '../config/env';\n\nexport interface OpenMeteoCurrentWeather {\n current: {\n temperature_2m: number;\n relative_humidity_2m: number;\n precipitation: number;\n wind_speed_10m: number;\n wind_direction_10m: number;\n };\n}\n\nexport interface OpenMeteoForecast {\n daily: {\n time: string[];\n temperature_2m_max: number[];\n temperature_2m_min: number[];\n precipitation_sum: number[];\n wind_speed_10m_max: number[];\n precipitation_probability_max: number[];\n };\n}\n\nexport interface OpenMeteoHistorical {\n daily: {\n time: string[];\n temperature_2m_max: number[];\n temperature_2m_min: number[];\n precipitation_sum: number[];\n relative_humidity_2m: number[];\n wind_speed_10m: number[];\n };\n}\n\nclass OpenMeteoService {\n private client: AxiosInstance;\n private archiveClient: AxiosInstance;\n\n constructor() {\n this.client = axios.create({\n baseURL: ENV_CONFIG.OPEN_METEO_BASE_URL,\n timeout: 15000,\n });\n\n this.archiveClient = axios.create({\n baseURL: ENV_CONFIG.OPEN_METEO_ARCHIVE_URL,\n timeout: 15000,\n });\n }\n\n async getCurrentWeather(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<OpenMeteoCurrentWeather> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/forecast', {\n params: {\n latitude: lat,\n longitude: lon,\n current: [\n 'temperature_2m',\n 'relative_humidity_2m',\n 'precipitation',\n 'wind_speed_10m',\n 'wind_direction_10m'\n ].join(','),\n timezone: 'Africa/Ouagadougou'\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur m\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle Open-Meteo:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer la m\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle');\n }\n }\n\n async getForecast(lat: number, lon: number, days: number = 7): Promise<OpenMeteoForecast> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/forecast', {\n params: {\n latitude: lat,\n longitude: lon,\n daily: [\n 'temperature_2m_max',\n 'temperature_2m_min',\n 'precipitation_sum',\n 'wind_speed_10m_max',\n 'precipitation_probability_max'\n ].join(','),\n forecast_days: days,\n timezone: 'Africa/Ouagadougou'\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur pr\u00e9visions Open-Meteo:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les pr\u00e9visions');\n }\n }\n\n async getHistoricalWeather(\n lat: number, \n lon: number, \n startDate: string, \n endDate: string\n ): Promise<OpenMeteoHistorical> {\n try {\n const response = await this.archiveClient.get('/archive', {\n params: {\n latitude: lat,\n longitude: lon,\n start_date: startDate,\n end_date: endDate,\n daily: [\n 'temperature_2m_max',\n 'temperature_2m_min',\n 'precipitation_sum',\n 'relative_humidity_2m',\n 'wind_speed_10m'\n ].join(','),\n timezone: 'Africa/Ouagadougou'\n }\n });\n\n return response.data;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur donn\u00e9es historiques Open-Meteo:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les donn\u00e9es historiques');\n }\n }\n\n async getPrecipitationDaily(\n lat: number,\n lon: number,\n startDate: string,\n endDate: string\n ): Promise<number[]> {\n try {\n const data = await this.getHistoricalWeather(lat, lon, startDate, endDate);\n return data.daily.precipitation_sum;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur pr\u00e9cipitations Open-Meteo:', error);\n return [];\n }\n }\n\n // Calcul de l'\u00e9vapotranspiration de r\u00e9f\u00e9rence (ET0) selon FAO-56\n calculateET0(\n tempMax: number,\n tempMin: number,\n humidity: number,\n windSpeed: number,\n latitude: number,\n dayOfYear: number\n ): number {\n try {\n const tempMean = (tempMax + tempMin) / 2;\n \n // Pression de vapeur saturante\n const es = (0.6108 * Math.exp(17.27 * tempMax / (tempMax + 237.3)) + \n 0.6108 * Math.exp(17.27 * tempMin / (tempMin + 237.3))) / 2;\n \n // Pression de vapeur actuelle\n const ea = es * humidity / 100;\n \n // Pente de la courbe de pression de vapeur\n const delta = 4098 * es / Math.pow(tempMean + 237.3, 2);\n \n // Constante psychrom\u00e9trique\n const gamma = 0.665;\n \n // Radiation extraterrestre approximative\n const dr = 1 + 0.033 * Math.cos(2 * Math.PI * dayOfYear / 365);\n const decl = 0.409 * Math.sin(2 * Math.PI * dayOfYear / 365 - 1.39);\n const latRad = latitude * Math.PI / 180;\n const ws = Math.acos(-Math.tan(latRad) * Math.tan(decl));\n const Ra = 24 * 60 / Math.PI * 0.082 * dr * \n (ws * Math.sin(latRad) * Math.sin(decl) + \n Math.cos(latRad) * Math.cos(decl) * Math.sin(ws));\n \n // Radiation solaire estim\u00e9e (Rs = 0.16 * sqrt(tempMax - tempMin) * Ra)\n const Rs = 0.16 * Math.sqrt(Math.abs(tempMax - tempMin)) * Ra;\n \n // ET0 selon Penman-Monteith\n const et0 = (0.408 * delta * Rs + gamma * 900 / (tempMean + 273) * windSpeed * (es - ea)) /\n (delta + gamma * (1 + 0.34 * windSpeed));\n \n return Math.max(0, et0);\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur calcul ET0:', error);\n return 0;\n }\n }\n}\n\n// Instance singleton\nexport const openMeteoService = new OpenMeteoService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 4. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/services/weatherValidationService.ts", "file_content": "import { openEpiService } from './openEpiService';\nimport { openMeteoService } from './openMeteoService';\nimport axios from 'axios';\nimport { ENV_CONFIG } from '../config/env';\n\nexport interface ValidationResult {\n openEpiData: any;\n openMeteoData: any;\n meteoBurkinaData: any;\n validation: {\n precipitationVariance: number;\n temperatureVariance: number;\n dataQuality: 'excellent' | 'good' | 'fair' | 'poor';\n warnings: string[];\n recommendations: string[];\n };\n}\n\nexport interface WeatherDataPoint {\n source: string;\n precipitation: number;\n temperatureMax: number;\n temperatureMin: number;\n humidity?: number;\n windSpeed?: number;\n}\n\nclass WeatherValidationService {\n \n async validateWeatherData(\n lat: number, \n lon: number, \n date: string\n ): Promise<ValidationResult> {\n try {\n console.log(`\ud83d\udd0d Validation des donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9o pour ${date} \u00e0 (${lat}, ${lon})`);\n\n // R\u00e9cup\u00e9ration des donn\u00e9es depuis diff\u00e9rentes sources\n const [openEpiData, openMeteoData, meteoBurkinaData] = await Promise.allSettled([\n this.getOpenEpiData(lat, lon, date),\n this.getOpenMeteoData(lat, lon, date),\n this.getMeteoBurkinaData(lat, lon, date)\n ]);\n\n // Extraction des valeurs pour validation\n const dataPoints: WeatherDataPoint[] = [];\n\n if (openEpiData.status === 'fulfilled' && openEpiData.value) {\n dataPoints.push({\n source: 'OpenEPI',\n precipitation: openEpiData.value.daily?.precipitation_sum?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMax: openEpiData.value.daily?.temperature_2m_max?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMin: openEpiData.value.daily?.temperature_2m_min?.[0] || 0,\n humidity: openEpiData.value.daily?.relative_humidity_2m?.[0],\n windSpeed: openEpiData.value.daily?.wind_speed_10m?.[0]\n });\n }\n\n if (openMeteoData.status === 'fulfilled' && openMeteoData.value) {\n dataPoints.push({\n source: 'Open-Meteo',\n precipitation: openMeteoData.value.daily?.precipitation_sum?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMax: openMeteoData.value.daily?.temperature_2m_max?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMin: openMeteoData.value.daily?.temperature_2m_min?.[0] || 0,\n humidity: openMeteoData.value.daily?.relative_humidity_2m?.[0],\n windSpeed: openMeteoData.value.daily?.wind_speed_10m?.[0]\n });\n }\n\n if (meteoBurkinaData.status === 'fulfilled' && meteoBurkinaData.value) {\n dataPoints.push({\n source: 'M\u00e9t\u00e9o Burkina',\n precipitation: meteoBurkinaData.value.precipitation || 0,\n temperatureMax: meteoBurkinaData.value.temperatureMax || 0,\n temperatureMin: meteoBurkinaData.value.temperatureMin || 0,\n humidity: meteoBurkinaData.value.humidity,\n windSpeed: meteoBurkinaData.value.windSpeed\n });\n }\n\n // Calcul des variances et validation\n const validation = this.calculateValidation(dataPoints);\n\n return {\n openEpiData: openEpiData.status === 'fulfilled' ? openEpiData.value : null,\n openMeteoData: openMeteoData.status === 'fulfilled' ? openMeteoData.value : null,\n meteoBurkinaData: meteoBurkinaData.status === 'fulfilled' ? meteoBurkinaData.value : null,\n validation\n };\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur validation donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9o:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de valider les donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9orologiques');\n }\n }\n\n private async getOpenEpiData(lat: number, lon: number, date: string) {\n try {\n return await openEpiService.getHistorical({\n variables: ['precipitation_sum', 'temperature_2m_max', 'temperature_2m_min', 'relative_humidity_2m', 'wind_speed_10m'],\n bbox: [lon - 0.05, lat - 0.05, lon + 0.05, lat + 0.05],\n start: date,\n end: date\n });\n } catch (error) {\n console.warn('\u26a0\ufe0f Donn\u00e9es OpenEPI non disponibles:', error);\n return null;\n }\n }\n\n private async getOpenMeteoData(lat: number, lon: number, date: string) {\n try {\n return await openMeteoService.getHistoricalWeather(lat, lon, date, date);\n } catch (error) {\n console.warn('\u26a0\ufe0f Donn\u00e9es Open-Meteo non disponibles:', error);\n return null;\n }\n }\n\n private async getMeteoBurkinaData(lat: number, lon: number, date: string) {\n try {\n // Simulation d'appel \u00e0 l'API M\u00e9t\u00e9o Burkina (WIS2)\n // En r\u00e9alit\u00e9, vous devrez adapter selon leur documentation\n const response = await axios.get(`${ENV_CONFIG.METEO_BURKINA_BASE_URL}/observations`, {\n params: {\n lat: lat,\n lon: lon,\n start: date,\n end: date\n },\n timeout: 10000\n });\n\n return response.data?.[0] || null;\n } catch (error) {\n console.warn('\u26a0\ufe0f Donn\u00e9es M\u00e9t\u00e9o Burkina non disponibles:', error);\n return null;\n }\n }\n\n private calculateValidation(dataPoints: WeatherDataPoint[]) {\n if (dataPoints.length < 2) {\n return {\n precipitationVariance: 0,\n temperatureVariance: 0,\n dataQuality: 'poor' as const,\n warnings: ['Donn\u00e9es insuffisantes pour validation'],\n recommendations: ['V\u00e9rifier la connectivit\u00e9 r\u00e9seau', 'R\u00e9essayer plus tard']\n };\n }\n\n // Calcul des moyennes\n const avgPrecipitation = dataPoints.reduce((sum, dp) => sum + dp.precipitation, 0) / dataPoints.length;\n const avgTempMax = dataPoints.reduce((sum, dp) => sum + dp.temperatureMax, 0) / dataPoints.length;\n\n // Calcul des variances\n const precipitationVariance = dataPoints.reduce((sum, dp) => \n sum + Math.pow(dp.precipitation - avgPrecipitation, 2), 0) / dataPoints.length;\n \n const temperatureVariance = dataPoints.reduce((sum, dp) => \n sum + Math.pow(dp.temperatureMax - avgTempMax, 2), 0) / dataPoints.length;\n\n // Calcul des \u00e9carts relatifs\n const precipitationCV = avgPrecipitation > 0 ? Math.sqrt(precipitationVariance) / avgPrecipitation : 0;\n const temperatureCV = avgTempMax > 0 ? Math.sqrt(temperatureVariance) / avgTempMax : 0;\n\n // D\u00e9termination de la qualit\u00e9 des donn\u00e9es\n let dataQuality: 'excellent' | 'good' | 'fair' | 'poor';\n const warnings: string[] = [];\n const recommendations: string[] = [];\n\n if (precipitationCV < 0.1 && temperatureCV < 0.05) {\n dataQuality = 'excellent';\n } else if (precipitationCV < 0.2 && temperatureCV < 0.1) {\n dataQuality = 'good';\n } else if (precipitationCV < 0.4 && temperatureCV < 0.15) {\n dataQuality = 'fair';\n warnings.push('\u00c9carts mod\u00e9r\u00e9s entre les sources de donn\u00e9es');\n recommendations.push('Surveiller les tendances sur plusieurs jours');\n } else {\n dataQuality = 'poor';\n warnings.push('\u00c9carts importants entre les sources de donn\u00e9es');\n recommendations.push('V\u00e9rification manuelle recommand\u00e9e');\n recommendations.push('Utiliser des donn\u00e9es de stations locales si disponibles');\n }\n\n // Ajouter des avertissements sp\u00e9cifiques\n if (precipitationCV > 0.3) {\n warnings.push(`Forte variance des pr\u00e9cipitations (${(precipitationCV * 100).toFixed(1)}%)`);\n }\n \n if (temperatureCV > 0.1) {\n warnings.push(`Variance temp\u00e9rature \u00e9lev\u00e9e (${(temperatureCV * 100).toFixed(1)}%)`);\n }\n\n return {\n precipitationVariance,\n temperatureVariance,\n dataQuality,\n warnings,\n recommendations\n };\n }\n\n // M\u00e9thode pour obtenir des donn\u00e9es fiables (moyenne pond\u00e9r\u00e9e)\n async getReliableWeatherData(lat: number, lon: number, date: string) {\n const validation = await this.validateWeatherData(lat, lon, date);\n \n // Si la qualit\u00e9 est bonne, retourner la moyenne\n if (validation.validation.dataQuality === 'excellent' || validation.validation.dataQuality === 'good') {\n return {\n precipitation: this.getAverageValue([\n validation.openEpiData?.daily?.precipitation_sum?.[0],\n validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.precipitation_sum?.[0],\n validation.meteoBurkinaData?.precipitation\n ]),\n temperatureMax: this.getAverageValue([\n validation.openEpiData?.daily?.temperature_2m_max?.[0],\n validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.temperature_2m_max?.[0],\n validation.meteoBurkinaData?.temperatureMax\n ]),\n temperatureMin: this.getAverageValue([\n validation.openEpiData?.daily?.temperature_2m_min?.[0],\n validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.temperature_2m_min?.[0],\n validation.meteoBurkinaData?.temperatureMin\n ]),\n quality: validation.validation.dataQuality,\n sources: validation.validation.warnings.length === 0 ? 'multiple' : 'limited'\n };\n }\n\n // Sinon, privil\u00e9gier Open-Meteo (plus fiable g\u00e9n\u00e9ralement)\n return {\n precipitation: validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.precipitation_sum?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMax: validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.temperature_2m_max?.[0] || 0,\n temperatureMin: validation.openMeteoData?.daily?.temperature_2m_min?.[0] || 0,\n quality: validation.validation.dataQuality,\n sources: 'fallback'\n };\n }\n\n private getAverageValue(values: (number | undefined)[]): number {\n const validValues = values.filter(v => v !== undefined && v !== null) as number[];\n if (validValues.length === 0) return 0;\n return validValues.reduce((sum, val) => sum + val, 0) / validValues.length;\n }\n}\n\n// Instance singleton\nexport const weatherValidationService = new WeatherValidationService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 5. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/services/climateRiskService.ts", "file_content": "import { openMeteoService } from './openMeteoService';\nimport { weatherValidationService } from './weatherValidationService';\n\nexport interface RiskAnalysis {\n riskLevel: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' | 'critical';\n riskType: 'drought' | 'flood' | 'storm' | 'heat_stress' | 'multiple';\n riskScore: number; // 0-100\n triggers: {\n droughtDays: number;\n excessivePrecipitation: number;\n temperatureStress: number;\n ndviAnomaly?: number;\n };\n recommendations: string[];\n compensationEligible: boolean;\n alertLevel: 'info' | 'warning' | 'danger' | 'emergency';\n}\n\nexport interface ClimateIndicators {\n consecutiveDryDays: number;\n totalPrecipitation: number;\n averageTemperature: number;\n maxTemperature: number;\n et0: number; // \u00c9vapotranspiration de r\u00e9f\u00e9rence\n precipitationAnomaly: number; // % par rapport \u00e0 la normale\n temperatureAnomaly: number;\n}\n\nclass ClimateRiskService {\n\n async analyzeRisk(\n lat: number,\n lon: number,\n cropType: string,\n farmSize: number,\n analysisDate: string = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]\n ): Promise<RiskAnalysis> {\n try {\n console.log(`\ud83c\udf21\ufe0f Analyse des risques climatiques pour ${cropType} \u00e0 (${lat}, ${lon})`);\n\n // R\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les donn\u00e9es des 30 derniers jours\n const endDate = new Date(analysisDate);\n const startDate = new Date(endDate);\n startDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() - 30);\n\n const historicalData = await openMeteoService.getHistoricalWeather(\n lat, lon, \n startDate.toISOString().split('T')[0],\n endDate.toISOString().split('T')[0]\n );\n\n // Calculer les indicateurs climatiques\n const indicators = this.calculateClimateIndicators(historicalData, lat);\n\n // Analyser les risques selon le type de culture\n const riskAnalysis = this.assessRiskByCrop(indicators, cropType, farmSize);\n\n console.log(`\ud83d\udcca Analyse termin\u00e9e - Niveau de risque: ${riskAnalysis.riskLevel}`);\n return riskAnalysis;\n\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur analyse des risques:', error);\n \n // Retourner une analyse par d\u00e9faut en cas d'erreur\n return {\n riskLevel: 'medium',\n riskType: 'drought',\n riskScore: 50,\n triggers: {\n droughtDays: 0,\n excessivePrecipitation: 0,\n temperatureStress: 0\n },\n recommendations: ['Donn\u00e9es insuffisantes - surveillance manuelle recommand\u00e9e'],\n compensationEligible: false,\n alertLevel: 'warning'\n };\n }\n }\n\n private calculateClimateIndicators(data: any, latitude: number): ClimateIndicators {\n const precipitations = data.daily.precipitation_sum || [];\n const tempMax = data.daily.temperature_2m_max || [];\n const tempMin = data.daily.temperature_2m_min || [];\n const humidity = data.daily.relative_humidity_2m || [];\n const windSpeed = data.daily.wind_speed_10m || [];\n\n // Calcul des jours cons\u00e9cutifs sans pluie (< 1mm)\n let consecutiveDryDays = 0;\n let maxConsecutiveDryDays = 0;\n let currentDryStreak = 0;\n\n precipitations.forEach(precip => {\n if (precip < 1) {\n currentDryStreak++;\n maxConsecutiveDryDays = Math.max(maxConsecutiveDryDays, currentDryStreak);\n } else {\n currentDryStreak = 0;\n }\n });\n\n // Jours secs actuels (depuis la fin)\n for (let i = precipitations.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n if (precipitations[i] < 1) {\n consecutiveDryDays++;\n } else {\n break;\n }\n }\n\n // Pr\u00e9cipitations totales\n const totalPrecipitation = precipitations.reduce((sum: number, p: number) => sum + p, 0);\n\n // Temp\u00e9ratures moyennes\n const averageTemperature = tempMax.reduce((sum: number, temp: number, i: number) => \n sum + (temp + tempMin[i]) / 2, 0) / tempMax.length;\n \n const maxTemperatureRecord = Math.max(...tempMax);\n\n // Calcul ET0 moyen\n const et0Values = tempMax.map((tMax, i) => \n openMeteoService.calculateET0(\n tMax, \n tempMin[i], \n humidity[i] || 70, \n windSpeed[i] || 2, \n latitude, \n new Date().getDay()\n )\n );\n const averageET0 = et0Values.reduce((sum, et0) => sum + et0, 0) / et0Values.length;\n\n // Anomalies (comparaison avec des normales approximatives pour le Burkina Faso)\n const normalPrecipitation = this.getNormalPrecipitation(new Date().getMonth());\n const normalTemperature = this.getNormalTemperature(new Date().getMonth());\n\n const precipitationAnomaly = normalPrecipitation > 0 ? \n ((totalPrecipitation - normalPrecipitation) / normalPrecipitation) * 100 : 0;\n \n const temperatureAnomaly = normalTemperature > 0 ? \n ((averageTemperature - normalTemperature) / normalTemperature) * 100 : 0;\n\n return {\n consecutiveDryDays: Math.max(consecutiveDryDays, maxConsecutiveDryDays),\n totalPrecipitation,\n averageTemperature,\n maxTemperature: maxTemperatureRecord,\n et0: averageET0,\n precipitationAnomaly,\n temperatureAnomaly\n };\n }\n\n private assessRiskByCrop(\n indicators: ClimateIndicators, \n cropType: string, \n farmSize: number\n ): RiskAnalysis {\n let riskScore = 0;\n let riskType: RiskAnalysis['riskType'] = 'drought';\n const recommendations: string[] = [];\n let compensationEligible = false;\n\n // Seuils sp\u00e9cifiques par culture\n const cropThresholds = this.getCropThresholds(cropType);\n\n // Analyse du risque de s\u00e9cheresse\n if (indicators.consecutiveDryDays >= cropThresholds.droughtDays.critical) {\n riskScore += 40;\n riskType = 'drought';\n recommendations.push('\ud83d\udea8 S\u00e9cheresse critique d\u00e9tect\u00e9e');\n recommendations.push('\ud83d\udca7 Irrigation d\\'urgence n\u00e9cessaire');\n compensationEligible = true;\n } else if (indicators.consecutiveDryDays >= cropThresholds.droughtDays.warning) {\n riskScore += 25;\n recommendations.push('\u26a0\ufe0f P\u00e9riode s\u00e8che prolong\u00e9e');\n recommendations.push('\ud83d\udca7 Pr\u00e9voir irrigation si possible');\n }\n\n // Analyse du risque d'inondation\n if (indicators.totalPrecipitation >= cropThresholds.floodPrecipitation.critical) {\n riskScore += 35;\n riskType = indicators.consecutiveDryDays > 10 ? 'multiple' : 'flood';\n recommendations.push('\ud83c\udf0a Risque d\\'inondation \u00e9lev\u00e9');\n recommendations.push('\ud83d\udeb0 Am\u00e9liorer le drainage');\n compensationEligible = true;\n }\n\n // Analyse du stress thermique\n if (indicators.maxTemperature >= cropThresholds.heatStress.critical) {\n riskScore += 30;\n riskType = riskType === 'drought' ? 'multiple' : 'heat_stress';\n recommendations.push('\ud83c\udf21\ufe0f Stress thermique critique');\n recommendations.push('\ud83c\udf3f Prot\u00e9ger les cultures du soleil');\n compensationEligible = true;\n }\n\n // Analyse des anomalies\n if (indicators.precipitationAnomaly < -50) {\n riskScore += 20;\n recommendations.push('\ud83d\udcc9 D\u00e9ficit pluviom\u00e9trique important');\n }\n\n if (indicators.temperatureAnomaly > 15) {\n riskScore += 15;\n recommendations.push('\ud83c\udf21\ufe0f Temp\u00e9ratures anormalement \u00e9lev\u00e9es');\n }\n\n // Ajustement selon la taille de l'exploitation\n if (farmSize > 5) {\n riskScore += 5; // Grandes exploitations plus vuln\u00e9rables\n }\n\n // D\u00e9termination du niveau de risque\n let riskLevel: RiskAnalysis['riskLevel'];\n let alertLevel: RiskAnalysis['alertLevel'];\n\n if (riskScore >= 80) {\n riskLevel = 'critical';\n alertLevel = 'emergency';\n } else if (riskScore >= 60) {\n riskLevel = 'high';\n alertLevel = 'danger';\n } else if (riskScore >= 30) {\n riskLevel = 'medium';\n alertLevel = 'warning';\n } else {\n riskLevel = 'low';\n alertLevel = 'info';\n }\n\n // Recommandations g\u00e9n\u00e9rales\n if (riskLevel === 'low') {\n recommendations.push('\u2705 Conditions favorables aux cultures');\n }\n\n return {\n riskLevel,\n riskType,\n riskScore: Math.min(100, riskScore),\n triggers: {\n droughtDays: indicators.consecutiveDryDays,\n excessivePrecipitation: indicators.totalPrecipitation,\n temperatureStress: indicators.maxTemperature,\n ndviAnomaly: 0 // \u00c0 impl\u00e9menter avec les donn\u00e9es satellite\n },\n recommendations,\n compensationEligible,\n alertLevel\n };\n }\n\n private getCropThresholds(cropType: string) {\n const thresholds = {\n 'millet': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 15, critical: 25 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 150 },\n heatStress: { critical: 42 }\n },\n 'sorghum': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 12, critical: 20 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 120 },\n heatStress: { critical: 40 }\n },\n 'maize': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 10, critical: 15 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 100 },\n heatStress: { critical: 38 }\n },\n 'cotton': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 14, critical: 21 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 130 },\n heatStress: { critical: 41 }\n },\n 'groundnut': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 12, critical: 18 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 110 },\n heatStress: { critical: 39 }\n },\n 'cowpea': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 10, critical: 16 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 90 },\n heatStress: { critical: 37 }\n },\n 'sesame': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 18, critical: 28 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 80 },\n heatStress: { critical: 43 }\n },\n 'rice': {\n droughtDays: { warning: 5, critical: 10 },\n floodPrecipitation: { critical: 200 },\n heatStress: { critical: 36 }\n }\n };\n\n return thresholds[cropType as keyof typeof thresholds] || thresholds.maize;\n }\n\n private getNormalPrecipitation(month: number): number {\n // Pr\u00e9cipitations normales mensuelles approximatives pour le Burkina Faso (mm)\n const normals = [5, 10, 25, 45, 85, 120, 180, 220, 150, 60, 15, 5];\n return normals[month] || 50;\n }\n\n private getNormalTemperature(month: number): number {\n // Temp\u00e9ratures normales mensuelles approximatives pour le Burkina Faso (\u00b0C)\n const normals = [28, 32, 36, 38, 36, 33, 30, 29, 30, 33, 32, 28];\n return normals[month] || 32;\n }\n}\n\n// Instance singleton\nexport const climateRiskService = new ClimateRiskService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 6. useCallback } from 'react';\nimport { openMeteoService } from '../services/openMeteoService';\nimport { climateRiskService, RiskAnalysis } from '../services/climateRiskService';\nimport { weatherValidationService } from '../services/weatherValidationService';\n\nexport interface WeatherData {\n current: {\n temperature: number;\n humidity: number;\n precipitation: number;\n windSpeed: number;\n };\n forecast: {\n date: string;\n tempMax: number;\n tempMin: number;\n precipitation: number;\n precipitationProbability: number;\n }[];\n riskAnalysis: RiskAnalysis | null;\n lastUpdated: string;\n}\n\nexport interface UseWeatherDataOptions {\n autoRefresh?: boolean;\n refreshInterval?: number; // en minutes\n enableRiskAnalysis?: boolean;\n}\n\nexport function useWeatherData(\n latitude: number | null,\n longitude: number | null,\n cropType?: string,\n farmSize?: number,\n options: UseWeatherDataOptions = {}\n) {\n const [weatherData, setWeatherData] = useState<WeatherData | null>(null);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);\n\n const {\n autoRefresh = false,\n refreshInterval = 30,\n enableRiskAnalysis = true\n } = options;\n\n const fetchWeatherData = useCallback(async () => {\n if (!latitude || !longitude) {\n setError('Coordonn\u00e9es GPS requises');\n return;\n }\n\n setLoading(true);\n setError(null);\n\n try {\n console.log(`\ud83c\udf24\ufe0f R\u00e9cup\u00e9ration donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9o pour (${latitude}, ${longitude})`);\n\n // R\u00e9cup\u00e9ration des donn\u00e9es actuelles et pr\u00e9visions\n const [currentWeather, forecast] = await Promise.all([\n openMeteoService.getCurrentWeather(latitude, longitude),\n openMeteoService.getForecast(latitude, longitude, 7)\n ]);\n\n // Analyse des risques si activ\u00e9e et donn\u00e9es de culture disponibles\n let riskAnalysis: RiskAnalysis | null = null;\n if (enableRiskAnalysis && cropType && farmSize) {\n try {\n riskAnalysis = await climateRiskService.analyzeRisk(\n latitude, \n longitude, \n cropType, \n farmSize\n );\n } catch (riskError) {\n console.warn('\u26a0\ufe0f Impossible d\\'analyser les risques:', riskError);\n }\n }\n\n // Formatage des donn\u00e9es\n const formattedData: WeatherData = {\n current: {\n temperature: currentWeather.current.temperature_2m,\n humidity: currentWeather.current.relative_humidity_2m,\n precipitation: currentWeather.current.precipitation,\n windSpeed: currentWeather.current.wind_speed_10m\n },\n forecast: forecast.daily.time.map((date, index) => ({\n date,\n tempMax: forecast.daily.temperature_2m_max[index],\n tempMin: forecast.daily.temperature_2m_min[index],\n precipitation: forecast.daily.precipitation_sum[index],\n precipitationProbability: forecast.daily.precipitation_probability_max[index]\n })),\n riskAnalysis,\n lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString()\n };\n\n setWeatherData(formattedData);\n console.log('\u2705 Donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9o r\u00e9cup\u00e9r\u00e9es avec succ\u00e8s');\n\n } catch (err) {\n const errorMessage = err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Erreur inconnue';\n console.error('\u274c Erreur r\u00e9cup\u00e9ration m\u00e9t\u00e9o:', errorMessage);\n setError(errorMessage);\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, [latitude, longitude, cropType, farmSize, enableRiskAnalysis]);\n\n // Validation des donn\u00e9es m\u00e9t\u00e9o\n const validateData = useCallback(async (date?: string) => {\n if (!latitude || !longitude) return null;\n\n try {\n const validationDate = date || new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];\n return await weatherValidationService.validateWeatherData(\n latitude, \n longitude, \n validationDate\n );\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur validation donn\u00e9es:', error);\n return null;\n }\n }, [latitude, longitude]);\n\n // Obtenir des donn\u00e9es fiables\n const getReliableData = useCallback(async (date?: string) => {\n if (!latitude || !longitude) return null;\n\n try {\n const validationDate = date || new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];\n return await weatherValidationService.getReliableWeatherData(\n latitude, \n longitude, \n validationDate\n );\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur donn\u00e9es fiables:', error);\n return null;\n }\n }, [latitude, longitude]);\n\n // Effet pour le chargement initial\n useEffect(() => {\n if (latitude && longitude) {\n fetchWeatherData();\n }\n }, [fetchWeatherData]);\n\n // Effet pour l'auto-refresh\n useEffect(() => {\n if (!autoRefresh || !latitude || !longitude) return;\n\n const interval = setInterval(() => {\n fetchWeatherData();\n }, refreshInterval * 60 * 1000); // Conversion en millisecondes\n\n return () => clearInterval(interval);\n }, [autoRefresh, refreshInterval, fetchWeatherData]);\n\n return {\n weatherData,\n loading,\n error,\n refetch: fetchWeatherData,\n validateData,\n getReliableData\n };\n}\n\n// Hook sp\u00e9cialis\u00e9 pour les alertes m\u00e9t\u00e9o\nexport function useWeatherAlerts(\n latitude: number | null,\n longitude: number | null,\n cropType?: string,\n farmSize?: number\n) {\n const [alerts, setAlerts] = useState<RiskAnalysis[]>([]);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n\n const checkAlerts = useCallback(async () => {\n if (!latitude || !longitude || !cropType || !farmSize) return;\n\n setLoading(true);\n try {\n const riskAnalysis = await climateRiskService.analyzeRisk(\n latitude, \n longitude, \n cropType, \n farmSize\n );\n\n // Ajouter l'alerte si le niveau de risque est \u00e9lev\u00e9\n if (riskAnalysis.riskLevel === 'high' || riskAnalysis.riskLevel === 'critical') {\n setAlerts(prev => {\n // \u00c9viter les doublons\n const exists = prev.some(alert => \n alert.riskType === riskAnalysis.riskType && \n alert.riskLevel === riskAnalysis.riskLevel\n );\n \n if (!exists) {\n return [...prev, riskAnalysis];\n }\n return prev;\n });\n }\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u274c Erreur v\u00e9rification alertes:', error);\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, [latitude, longitude, cropType, farmSize]);\n\n const dismissAlert = useCallback((index: number) => {\n setAlerts(prev => prev.filter((_, i) => i !== index));\n }, []);\n\n const clearAllAlerts = useCallback(() => {\n setAlerts([]);\n }, []);\n\n // V\u00e9rification automatique des alertes toutes les heures\n useEffect(() => {\n if (latitude && longitude && cropType && farmSize) {\n checkAlerts();\n \n const interval = setInterval(checkAlerts, 60 * 60 * 1000); // 1 heure\n return () => clearInterval(interval);\n }\n }, [checkAlerts]);\n\n return {\n alerts,\n loading,\n checkAlerts,\n dismissAlert,\n clearAllAlerts\n };\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 8. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/screens/WeatherTestScreen.tsx", "file_content": "import React, { useState } from 'react';\nimport { View, Text, StyleSheet, ScrollView } from 'react-native';\nimport { openMeteoService } from '../services/openMeteoService';\nimport { climateRiskService } from '../services/climateRiskService';\nimport { weatherValidationService } from '../services/weatherValidationService';\nimport { validateApiKeys } from '../config/env';\nimport AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';\nimport { COLORS, ACCESSIBILITY_SETTINGS } from '../utils/constants';\n\ninterface WeatherTestScreenProps {\n navigation: any;\n}\n\nexport default function WeatherTestScreen({ navigation }: WeatherTestScreenProps) {\n const [testResults, setTestResults] = useState<any[]>([]);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n\n const runTests = async () => {\n setLoading(true);\n setTestResults([]);\n \n const results: any[] = [];\n \n // Coordonn\u00e9es de Ouagadougou pour les tests\n const lat = 12.3714;\n const lon = -1.5197;\n const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];\n\n try {\n // Test 1: Validation des cl\u00e9s API\n results.push({\n test: 'Validation des cl\u00e9s API',\n status: validateApiKeys() ? 'success' : 'warning',\n message: validateApiKeys() ? 'Toutes les cl\u00e9s sont configur\u00e9es' : 'Certaines cl\u00e9s manquent'\n });\n\n // Test 2: Open-Meteo m\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle\n try {\n const currentWeather = await openMeteoService.getCurrentWeather(lat, lon);\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - M\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle',\n status: 'success',\n message: `Temp\u00e9rature: ${currentWeather.current.temperature_2m}\u00b0C, Humidit\u00e9: ${currentWeather.current.relative_humidity_2m}%`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - M\u00e9t\u00e9o actuelle',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n // Test 3: Open-Meteo pr\u00e9visions\n try {\n const forecast = await openMeteoService.getForecast(lat, lon, 3);\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - Pr\u00e9visions',\n status: 'success',\n message: `${forecast.daily.time.length} jours de pr\u00e9visions r\u00e9cup\u00e9r\u00e9s`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - Pr\u00e9visions',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n // Test 4: Donn\u00e9es historiques\n try {\n const yesterday = new Date();\n yesterday.setDate(yesterday.getDate() - 1);\n const yesterdayStr = yesterday.toISOString().split('T')[0];\n \n const historical = await openMeteoService.getHistoricalWeather(lat, lon, yesterdayStr, yesterdayStr);\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - Donn\u00e9es historiques',\n status: 'success',\n message: `Pr\u00e9cipitations hier: ${historical.daily.precipitation_sum[0]} mm`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Open-Meteo - Donn\u00e9es historiques',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n // Test 5: Analyse des risques climatiques\n try {\n const riskAnalysis = await climateRiskService.analyzeRisk(lat, lon, 'maize', 2);\n results.push({\n test: 'Analyse des risques climatiques',\n status: riskAnalysis.riskLevel === 'critical' ? 'warning' : 'success',\n message: `Niveau: ${riskAnalysis.riskLevel}, Score: ${riskAnalysis.riskScore}/100, Type: ${riskAnalysis.riskType}`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Analyse des risques climatiques',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n // Test 6: Validation crois\u00e9e des donn\u00e9es\n try {\n const validation = await weatherValidationService.validateWeatherData(lat, lon, today);\n results.push({\n test: 'Validation crois\u00e9e des donn\u00e9es',\n status: validation.validation.dataQuality === 'poor' ? 'warning' : 'success',\n message: `Qualit\u00e9: ${validation.validation.dataQuality}, Avertissements: ${validation.validation.warnings.length}`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Validation crois\u00e9e des donn\u00e9es',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n // Test 7: Calcul ET0\n try {\n const et0 = openMeteoService.calculateET0(35, 25, 60, 10, lat, new Date().getDay());\n results.push({\n test: 'Calcul \u00e9vapotranspiration (ET0)',\n status: et0 > 0 ? 'success' : 'warning',\n message: `ET0 calcul\u00e9: ${et0.toFixed(2)} mm/jour`\n });\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Calcul \u00e9vapotranspiration (ET0)',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n } catch (error) {\n results.push({\n test: 'Test g\u00e9n\u00e9ral',\n status: 'error',\n message: `Erreur g\u00e9n\u00e9rale: ${error}`\n });\n }\n\n setTestResults(results);\n setLoading(false);\n };\n\n const getStatusColor = (status: string) => {\n switch (status) {\n case 'success': return COLORS.success;\n case 'warning': return COLORS.warning;\n case 'error': return COLORS.error;\n default: return COLORS.text.secondary;\n }\n };\n\n const getStatusIcon = (status: string) => {\n switch (status) {\n case 'success': return '\u2705';\n case 'warning': return '\u26a0\ufe0f';\n case 'error': return '\u274c';\n default: return '\u23f3';\n }\n };\n\n return (\n <View style={styles.container}>\n <View style={styles.header}>\n <AccessibleButton\n title=\"\u2190 Retour\"\n onPress={() => navigation.goBack()}\n style={styles.backButton}\n textStyle={styles.backButtonText}\n />\n <Text style={styles.title}>Test des APIs M\u00e9t\u00e9o</Text>\n </View>\n\n <ScrollView style={styles.content}>\n <Text style={styles.description}>\n Ce test v\u00e9rifie le bon fonctionnement des APIs m\u00e9t\u00e9orologiques et des services d'analyse climatique.\n </Text>\n\n <AccessibleButton\n title=\"\ud83e\uddea Lancer les tests\"\n onPress={runTests}\n loading={loading}\n style={styles.testButton}\n accessibilityHint=\"Lancer tous les tests des APIs m\u00e9t\u00e9o\"\n />\n\n {testResults.length > 0 && (\n <View style={styles.resultsSection}>\n <Text style={styles.resultsTitle}>R\u00e9sultats des tests</Text>\n \n {testResults.map((result, index) => (\n <View key={index} style={styles.resultItem}>\n <View style={styles.resultHeader}>\n <Text style={styles.resultIcon}>{getStatusIcon(result.status)}</Text>\n <Text style={styles.resultTest}>{result.test}</Text>\n </View>\n <Text \n style={[\n styles.resultMessage,\n { color: getStatusColor(result.status) }\n ]}\n >\n {result.message}\n </Text>\n </View>\n ))}\n\n <View style={styles.summary}>\n <Text style={styles.summaryTitle}>R\u00e9sum\u00e9</Text>\n <Text style={styles.summaryText}>\n \u2705 Succ\u00e8s: {testResults.filter(r => r.status === 'success').length}\n </Text>\n <Text style={styles.summaryText}>\n \u26a0\ufe0f Avertissements: {testResults.filter(r => r.status === 'warning').length}\n </Text>\n <Text style={styles.summaryText}>\n \u274c Erreurs: {testResults.filter(r => r.status === 'error').length}\n </Text>\n </View>\n </View>\n )}\n </ScrollView>\n </View>\n );\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 10. ### **Ce qui a été implémenté :**

#### **1. Services API complets :**
- **OpenEPI Service** : Authentification OAuth2, données climatiques historiques
- **Open-Meteo Service** : Météo actuelle, prévisions, données historiques, calcul ET0
- **Service de validation** : Validation croisée des données entre sources
- **Service d'analyse des risques** : Analyse automatique des risques climatiques par culture

#### **2. Fonctionnalités avancées :**
- **Calcul d'évapotranspiration (ET0)** selon FAO-56
- **Analyse des risques par culture** avec seuils spécifiques (mil, sorgho, maïs, coton, etc.)
- **Validation croisée des données** pour assurer la fiabilité
- **Détection automatique des alertes** (sécheresse, inondation, stress thermique)
- **Éligibilité automatique à l'indemnisation**

#### **3. Interface utilisateur intégrée :**
- **Dashboard météo en temps réel** avec données actuelles
- **Alertes climatiques intelligentes** avec recommandations
- **Indicateurs de qualité des données**
- **Écran de test des APIs** pour validation technique

#### **4. Hooks React personnalisés :**
- **useWeatherData** : Récupération automatique des données météo
- **useWeatherAlerts** : Surveillance des alertes en temps réel
- **Auto-refresh** configurable des données

#### **5. Persistance et configuration :**
- **Configuration centralisée** des clés API
- **Validation des clés** au démarrage
- **Gestion d'erreurs robuste**

### **Comment tester :**

1. **Accédez aux Paramètres** depuis le Dashboard
2. **Cliquez sur " Test APIs Météo"**
3. **Lancez les tests** pour vérifier que toutes les APIs fonctionnent
4. **Consultez le Dashboard** pour voir les données météo réelles

### **Données disponibles :**

- **Météo actuelle** : Température, humidité, précipitations, vent
- **Prévisions 7 jours** : Températures min/max, précipitations, probabilités
- **Analyse des risques** : Score de risque, type de risque, recommandations
- **Alertes automatiques** : Sécheresse, inondation, stress thermique
- **Validation des données** : Qualité, cohérence entre sources

### **Prochaines étapes suggérées :**

1. **Tester l'application** avec les vraies données météo
2. **Ajuster les seuils** de risque selon vos besoins
3. **Intégrer les données NDVI** satellitaires (NASA/Copernicus)
4. **Ajouter les notifications push** pour les alertes critiques
5. **Implémenter l'indemnisation automatique** basée sur les triggers

L'application dispose maintenant d'une **intelligence météorologique complète** pour la micro-assurance climatique ! ️

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/navigation/TabNavigator.tsx", "file_content": "import React from 'react';\nimport { createBottomTabNavigator } from '@react-navigation/bottom-tabs';\nimport { createNativeStackNavigator } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';\nimport { Text, View } from 'react-native';\nimport { COLORS } from '../utils/constants';\n\n// Screens\nimport DashboardScreen from '../screens/DashboardScreen';\nimport HistoryScreen from '../screens/HistoryScreen';\nimport PaymentsScreen from '../screens/PaymentsScreen';\nimport SettingsScreen from '../screens/SettingsScreen';\nimport ClaimsScreen from '../screens/ClaimsScreen';\nimport WeatherTestScreen from '../screens/WeatherTestScreen';\n\nconst Tab = createBottomTabNavigator();\nconst Stack = createNativeStackNavigator();\n\n// Stack pour le Dashboard (inclut les \u00e9crans secondaires)\nfunction DashboardStack() {\n return (\n <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>\n <Stack.Screen name=\"DashboardMain\" component={DashboardScreen} />\n <Stack.Screen name=\"Claims\" component={ClaimsScreen} />\n <Stack.Screen name=\"WeatherTest\" component={WeatherTestScreen} />\n </Stack.Navigator>\n );\n}\n\n// Stack pour les Param\u00e8tres\nfunction SettingsStack() {\n return (\n <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>\n <Stack.Screen name=\"SettingsMain\" component={SettingsScreen} />\n <Stack.Screen name=\"WeatherTest\" component={WeatherTestScreen} />\n </Stack.Navigator>\n );\n}\n\n// Composant d'ic\u00f4ne personnalis\u00e9\nfunction TabIcon({ name, focused }: { name: string; focused: boolean }) {\n const icons = {\n Dashboard: '\ud83c\udfe0',\n History: '\ud83d\udcca',\n Payments: '\ud83d\udcb0',\n Settings: '\u2699\ufe0f'\n };\n\n return (\n <View style={{ alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}>\n <Text style={{ \n fontSize: focused ? 24 : 20,\n opacity: focused ? 1 : 0.6 \n }}>\n {icons[name as keyof typeof icons]}\n </Text>\n </View>\n );\n}\n\nexport default function TabNavigator() {\n return (\n <Tab.Navigator\n screenOptions={({ route }) => ({\n headerShown: false,\n tabBarIcon: ({ focused }) => (\n <TabIcon name={route.name} focused={focused} />\n ),\n tabBarActiveTintColor: COLORS.primary,\n tabBarInactiveTintColor: COLORS.text.disabled,\n tabBarStyle: {\n backgroundColor: COLORS.surface,\n borderTopWidth: 1,\n borderTopColor: COLORS.text.disabled + '30',\n paddingBottom: 8,\n paddingTop: 8,\n height: 70,\n },\n tabBarLabelStyle: {\n fontSize: 12,\n fontWeight: '600',\n marginTop: 4,\n },\n tabBarItemStyle: {\n paddingVertical: 4,\n },\n })}\n >\n <Tab.Screen \n name=\"Dashboard\" \n component={DashboardStack}\n options={{\n title: 'Accueil',\n tabBarAccessibilityLabel: 'Accueil - Tableau de bord principal'\n }}\n />\n <Tab.Screen \n name=\"History\" \n component={HistoryScreen}\n options={{\n title: 'Historique',\n tabBarAccessibilityLabel: 'Historique des transactions'\n }}\n />\n <Tab.Screen \n name=\"Payments\" \n component={PaymentsScreen}\n options={{\n title: 'Paiements',\n tabBarAccessibilityLabel: 'Gestion des paiements'\n }}\n />\n <Tab.Screen \n name=\"Settings\" \n component={SettingsStack}\n options={{\n title: 'Param\u00e8tres',\n tabBarAccessibilityLabel: 'Param\u00e8tres de l\\'application'\n }}\n />\n </Tab.Navigator>\n );\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"## 2.  1	<img src="https://r2cdn.perplexity.ai/pplx-full-logo-primary-dark%402x.png" class="logo" width="120"/>
 2	
 3	# Plan Complet MVP Clim-Invest : Application React Native avec Expo Go
 4	
 5	## Initialisation du Projet
 6	
 7	### Commandes de Setup Initial
 8	
 9	```bash
 10	# Initialisation du projet Expo
 11	npx create-expo-app@latest ClimInvest --template blank-typescript
 12	
 13	# Navigation vers le dossier projet
 14	cd ClimInvest
 15	
 16	# Installation des dépendances principales
 17	npx expo install react-navigation/native react-navigation/native-stack react-navigation/bottom-tabs
 18	
 19	# Installation des dépendances de navigation
 20	npx expo install react-native-screens react-native-safe-area-context
 21	
 22	# Installation de Redux Toolkit pour gestion d'état
 23	npm install @reduxjs/toolkit react-redux
 24	
 25	# Installation Firebase pour authentification et données
 26	npx expo install @react-native-firebase/app @react-native-firebase/auth @react-native-firebase/firestore
 27	
 28	# Installation pour accessibilité et UX
 29	npm install react-native-gesture-handler react-native-reanimated
 30	npx expo install expo-location expo-device
 31	
 32	# Installation pour SMS et téléphonie
 33	npx expo install expo-sms expo-contacts
 34	
 35	# Démarrage du serveur de développement
 36	npx expo start
 37	```
 38	
 39	
 40	## Architecture du Projet Optimisée
 41	
 42	```
 43	ClimInvest/
 44	├── src/
 45	│ ├── components/ # Composants réutilisables accessibles
 46	│ │ ├── common/
 47	│ │ │ ├── AccessibleButton.tsx
 48	│ │ │ ├── AccessibleInput.tsx
 49	│ │ │ └── VoiceAssistant.tsx
 50	│ │ ├── forms/
 51	│ │ │ ├── OnboardingForm.tsx
 52	│ │ │ └── InsuranceCalculator.tsx
 53	│ │ └── cards/
 54	│ │ ├── WeatherAlert.tsx
 55	│ │ └── CoverageCard.tsx
 56	│ ├── screens/ # Écrans principaux
 57	│ │ ├── OnboardingScreen.tsx
 58	│ │ ├── RegistrationScreen.tsx
 59	│ │ ├── DashboardScreen.tsx
 60	│ │ ├── PremiumCalculationScreen.tsx
 61	│ │ ├── ClaimsScreen.tsx
 62	│ │ └── AdminDashboard.tsx
 63	│ ├── navigation/ # Configuration navigation
 64	│ │ ├── AppNavigator.tsx
 65	│ │ └── TabNavigator.tsx
 66	│ ├── store/ # Redux store et slices
 67	│ │ ├── store.ts
 68	│ │ ├── slices/
 69	│ │ │ ├── authSlice.ts
 70	│ │ │ ├── insuranceSlice.ts
 71	│ │ │ └── weatherSlice.ts
 72	│ ├── services/ # APIs et services externes
 73	│ │ ├── firebaseService.ts
 74	│ │ ├── weatherService.ts
 75	│ │ ├── smsService.ts
 76	│ │ └── accessibilityService.ts
 77	│ ├── utils/ # Utilitaires et logique métier
 78	│ │ ├── riskCalculator.ts
 79	│ │ ├── accessibilityUtils.ts
 80	│ │ └── constants.ts
 81	│ ├── hooks/ # Hooks personnalisés
 82	│ │ ├── useAccessibility.ts
 83	│ │ ├── useWeatherData.ts
 84	│ │ └── useVoiceInterface.ts
 85	│ └── types/ # Types TypeScript
 86	│ ├── insurance.ts
 87	│ ├── weather.ts
 88	│ └── user.ts
 89	├── assets/ # Assets accessibles

 96	
 97	## Écrans Principaux avec Accessibilité
 98	
 99	### 1. Écran d'Onboarding Accessible (OnboardingScreen.tsx)
 100	
 101	```typescript
 102	import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
 103	import { View, Text, AccessibilityInfo } from 'react-native';
 104	import { useAccessibility } from '../hooks/useAccessibility';
 105	import AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';
 106	import VoiceAssistant from '../components/common/VoiceAssistant';
 107	
 108	export default function OnboardingScreen({ navigation }: any) {
 109	 const { isScreenReaderEnabled, announceForAccessibility } = useAccessibility();
 110	 const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(0);
 111	
 112	 useEffect(() => {
 113	 announceForAccessibility("Bienvenue sur Clim-Invest. Protégez vos récoltes en 3 minutes");
 114	 }, []);
 115	
 116	 const steps = [
 117	 {
 118	 title: "Bienvenue sur Clim-Invest",
 119	 subtitle: "Micro-assurance climatique par SMS",
 120	 description: "Protection automatique contre sécheresses, inondations et tempêtes",
 121	 accessibilityLabel: "Écran de bienvenue. Clim-Invest offre une micro-assurance climatique accessible par SMS pour protéger vos cultures"
 122	 },
 123	 {
 124	 title: "Simple comme un SMS",
 125	 subtitle: "Souscription en 3 minutes",
 126	 description: "Pas besoin de banque ou de paperasse. Tout se fait par téléphone mobile",
 127	 accessibilityLabel: "Processus simple. Souscrivez votre assurance en 3 minutes par SMS, sans compte bancaire requis"
 128	 }
 129	 ];
 130	
 131	 return (
 132	 <View 
 133	 style={styles.container}
 134	 accessibilityRole="main"
 135	 accessibilityLabel="Écran principal d'accueil"
 136	 >
 137	 {/* Interface vocale pour utilisateurs non-lettrés */}
 138	 <VoiceAssistant 
 139	 text={steps[currentStep].description}
 140	 language="fr-BF" // Français du Burkina Faso
 141	 />
 142	
 143	 <View style={styles.progressIndicator}>
 144	 {steps.map((_, index) => (
 145	 <View
 146	 key={index}
 147	 style={[
 148	 styles.progressDot,
 149	 index === currentStep && styles.progressDotActive
 150	 ]}
 151	 accessibilityRole="progressbar"
 152	 accessibilityValue={{ 
 153	 min: 0, 
 154	 max: steps.length - 1, 
 155	 now: currentStep 
 156	 }}
 157	 />
 158	 ))}
 159	 </View>
 160	
 161	 <Text
 162	 style={styles.title}
 163	 accessibilityRole="header"
 164	 accessibilityLevel={1}
 165	 >
 166	 {steps[currentStep].title}
 167	 </Text>
 168	
 169	 <Text
 170	 style={styles.description}
 171	 accessibilityLabel={steps[currentStep].accessibilityLabel}
 172	 >
 173	 {steps[currentStep].description}
 174	 </Text>
 175	
 176	 <AccessibleButton
 177	 title={currentStep === steps.length - 1 ? "Commencer" : "Suivant"}
 178	 onPress={() => {
 179	 if (currentStep === steps.length - 1) {
 180	 navigation.navigate('Registration');
 181	 } else {
 182	 setCurrentStep(currentStep + 1);
 183	 }
 184	 }}
 185	 accessibilityHint="Appuyez pour continuer vers l'étape suivante"
 186	 style={styles.primaryButton}
 187	 />
 188	 </View>
 189	 );
 190	}
 191	```
 192	
 193	
 194	### 2. Écran d'Inscription Adaptatif (RegistrationScreen.tsx)
 195	
 196	```typescript
 197	import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react';
 198	import { View, Text, Alert } from 'react-native';
 199	import * as Location from 'expo-location';
 200	import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux';
 201	import { registerUser } from '../store/slices/authSlice';
 202	import AccessibleInput from '../components/common/AccessibleInput';
 203	import AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';
 204	
 205	export default function RegistrationScreen({ navigation }: any) {
 206	 const dispatch = useDispatch();
 207	 const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
 208	 name: '',
 209	 phone: '',
 210	 location: null as any,
 211	 cropType: '',
 212	 farmSize: 1
 213	 });
 214	 const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
 215	
 216	 const cropTypes = [
 217	 { value: 'maize', label: 'Maïs', accessibilityLabel: 'Maïs, culture céréalière' },
 218	 { value: 'cotton', label: 'Coton', accessibilityLabel: 'Coton, culture de rente' },
 219	 { value: 'groundnut', label: 'Arachide', accessibilityLabel: 'Arachide, légumineuse oléagineuse' },
 220	 { value: 'vegetables', label: 'Maraîchage', accessibilityLabel: 'Maraîchage, cultures légumières' }
 221	 ];
 222	
 223	 const getCurrentLocation = useCallback(async () => {
 224	 try {
 225	 const { status } = await Location.requestForegroundPermissionsAsync();
 226	 if (status !== 'granted') {
 227	 Alert.alert('Permission refusée', 'Autorisation de localisation requise pour calculer les risques climatiques');
 228	 return;
 229	 }
 230	
 231	 setLoading(true);
 232	 const location = await Location.getCurrentPositionAsync({});
 233	 const address = await Location.reverseGeocodeAsync({
 234	 latitude: location.coords.latitude,
 235	 longitude: location.coords.longitude
 236	 });
 237	
 238	 setFormData(prev => ({
 239	 ...prev,
 240	 location: {
 241	 ...location.coords,
 242	 region: address[^0]?.region || 'Région inconnue'
 243	 }
 244	 }));
 245	 } catch (error) {
 246	 Alert.alert('Erreur', 'Impossible d\'obtenir votre localisation');
 247	 } finally {
 248	 setLoading(false);
 249	 }
 250	 }, []);
 251	
 252	 const handleRegistration = useCallback(async () => {
 253	 if (!formData.name || !formData.phone || !formData.cropType) {
 254	 Alert.alert('Champs requis', 'Veuillez remplir tous les champs obligatoires');
 255	 return;
 256	 }
 257	
 258	 setLoading(true);
 259	 try {
 260	 await dispatch(registerUser(formData));
 261	 navigation.navigate('PremiumCalculation', { userData: formData });
 262	 } catch (error) {
 263	 Alert.alert('Erreur', 'Échec de l\'inscription. Veuillez réessayer.');
 264	 } finally {
 265	 setLoading(false);
 266	 }
 267	 }, [formData, dispatch, navigation]);
 268	
 269	 return (
 270	 <View 
 271	 style={styles.container}
 272	 accessibilityRole="form"
 273	 accessibilityLabel="Formulaire d'inscription agriculteur"
 274	 >
 275	 <Text 
 276	 style={styles.header}
 277	 accessibilityRole="header"
 278	 accessibilityLevel={1}
 279	 >
 280	 Inscription Agriculteur
 281	 </Text>
 282	
 283	 <AccessibleInput
 284	 label="Nom complet"
 285	 value={formData.name}
 286	 onChangeText={(name) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, name }))}
 287	 placeholder="Entrez votre nom"
 288	 accessibilityLabel="Champ nom complet"
 289	 accessibilityHint="Saisissez votre nom et prénom"
 290	 required
 291	 />
 292	
 293	 <AccessibleInput
 294	 label="Numéro de téléphone"
 295	 value={formData.phone}
 296	 onChangeText={(phone) => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, phone }))}
 297	 placeholder="+226 XX XX XX XX"
 298	 keyboardType="phone-pad"
 299	 accessibilityLabel="Champ numéro de téléphone"
 300	 accessibilityHint="Numéro pour recevoir SMS et paiements Mobile Money"
 301	 required
 302	 />
 303	
 304	 <View style={styles.locationSection}>
 305	 <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Localisation de votre exploitation</Text>
 306	 {formData.location ? (
 307	 <Text 
 308	 style={styles.locationText}
 309	 accessibilityLabel={`Localisation actuelle : ${formData.location.region}`}
 310	 >
 311	 {formData.location.region}
 312	 </Text>
 313	 ) : (
 314	 <AccessibleButton
 315	 title="Obtenir ma position GPS"
 316	 onPress={getCurrentLocation}
 317	 loading={loading}
 318	 accessibilityHint="Utilise le GPS pour déterminer votre zone climatique"
 319	 style={styles.locationButton}
 320	 />
 321	 )}
 322	 </View>
 323	
 324	 <View style={styles.cropSection}>
 325	 <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Type de culture principale</Text>
 326	 {cropTypes.map((crop) => (
 327	 <AccessibleButton
 328	 key={crop.value}
 329	 title={crop.label}
 330	 onPress={() => setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, cropType: crop.value }))}
 331	 style={[
 332	 styles.cropButton,
 333	 formData.cropType === crop.value && styles.cropButtonSelected
 334	 ]}
 335	 accessibilityLabel={crop.accessibilityLabel}
 336	 accessibilityRole="radio"
 337	 accessibilityState={{ selected: formData.cropType === crop.value }}
 338	 />
 339	 ))}
 340	 </View>
 341	
 342	 <AccessibleButton
 343	 title="Calculer ma prime d'assurance"
 344	 onPress={handleRegistration}
 345	 loading={loading}
 346	 disabled={!formData.name || !formData.phone || !formData.cropType}
 347	 accessibilityHint="Procéder au calcul personnalisé de votre prime"
 348	 style={styles.primaryButton}
 349	 />
 350	 </View>
 351	 );
 352	}
 353	```

 356	### 3. Dashboard Agriculteur Intelligent (DashboardScreen.tsx)
 357	
 358	```typescript
 359	import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
 360	import { View, Text, ScrollView, RefreshControl } from 'react-native';
 361	import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux';
 362	import { fetchWeatherAlerts, fetchCoverageStatus } from '../store/slices/insuranceSlice';
 363	import WeatherAlert from '../components/cards/WeatherAlert';
 364	import CoverageCard from '../components/cards/CoverageCard';
 365	import AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';
 366	
 367	export default function DashboardScreen({ navigation }: any) {
 368	 const dispatch = useDispatch();
 369	 const { user } = useSelector((state: any) => state.auth);
 370	 const { coverage, weatherAlerts, loading } = useSelector((state: any) => state.insurance);
 371	 const [refreshing, setRefreshing] = useState(false);
 372	
 373	 useEffect(() => {
 374	 loadDashboardData();
 375	 }, []);
 376	
 377	 const loadDashboardData = async () => {
 378	 await Promise.all([
 379	 dispatch(fetchWeatherAlerts(user.location)),
 380	 dispatch(fetchCoverageStatus(user.id))
 381	 ]);
 382	 };
 383	
 384	 const onRefresh = async () => {
 385	 setRefreshing(true);
 386	 await loadDashboardData();
 387	 setRefreshing(false);
 388	 };
 389	
 390	 const handleEmergencyClaim = () => {
 391	 navigation.navigate('Claims', { emergency: true });
 392	 };
 393	
 394	 return (
 395	 <ScrollView 
 396	 style={styles.container}
 397	 refreshControl={
 398	 <RefreshControl 
 399	 refreshing={refreshing} 
 400	 onRefresh={onRefresh}
 401	 accessibilityLabel="Actualiser les données"
 402	 />
 403	 }
 404	 accessibilityRole="main"
 405	 accessibilityLabel="Tableau de bord agriculteur"
 406	 >
 407	 {/* En-tête utilisateur */}
 408	 <View style={styles.header}>
 409	 <Text 
 410	 style={styles.welcomeText}
 411	 accessibilityRole="header"
 412	 accessibilityLevel={1}
 413	 >
 414	 Bonjour {user.name} 
 415	 </Text>
 416	 <Text 
 417	 style={styles.statusText}
 418	 accessibilityLabel={`Statut couverture : ${coverage.isActive ? 'Actif' : 'Inactif'}`}
 419	 >
 420	 {coverage.isActive ? '️ Protégé' : '⚠️ Non protégé'}
 421	 </Text>
 422	 </View>
 423	
 424	 {/* Carte de couverture */}
 425	 <CoverageCard 
 426	 coverage={coverage}
 427	 accessibilityLabel={`Couverture assurance : ${coverage.amount} FCFA jusqu'au ${coverage.expiryDate}`}
 428	 />
 429	
 430	 {/* Alertes météo temps réel */}
 431	 <View style={styles.alertsSection}>
 432	 <Text 
 433	 style={styles.sectionTitle}
 434	 accessibilityRole="header"
 435	 accessibilityLevel={2}
 436	 >
 437	 Alertes Météo ️
 438	 </Text>
 439	 
 440	 {weatherAlerts.length > 0 ? (
 441	 weatherAlerts.map((alert: any, index: number) => (
 442	 <WeatherAlert
 443	 key={index}
 444	 alert={alert}
 445	 accessibilityLabel={`Alerte ${alert.type} : ${alert.description}`}
 446	 />
 447	 ))
 448	 ) : (
 449	 <Text 
 450	 style={styles.noAlertsText}
 451	 accessibilityLabel="Aucune alerte météo en cours"
 452	 >
 453	 ✅ Aucune alerte en cours
 454	 </Text>
 455	 )}
 456	 </View>
 457	
 458	 {/* Actions rapides */}
 459	 <View style={styles.actionsSection}>
 460	 <AccessibleButton
 461	 title=" Déclarer un Sinistre"
 462	 onPress={handleEmergencyClaim}
 463	 style={styles.emergencyButton}
 464	 accessibilityHint="Signaler des dégâts sur vos cultures pour indemnisation"
 465	 accessibilityRole="button"
 466	 />
 467	
 468	 <AccessibleButton
 469	 title=" Voir l'Historique"
 470	 onPress={() => navigation.navigate('History')}
 471	 style={styles.secondaryButton}
 472	 accessibilityHint="Consulter vos paiements et réclamations passées"
 473	 />
 474	
 475	 <AccessibleButton
 476	 title="⚙️ Paramètres"
 477	 onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Settings')}
 478	 style={styles.secondaryButton}
 479	 accessibilityHint="Modifier vos préférences et informations"
 480	 />
 481	 </View>
 482	
 483	 {/* Conseils de la semaine */}
 484	 <View style={styles.tipsSection}>
 485	 <Text 
 486	 style={styles.sectionTitle}
 487	 accessibilityRole="header"
 488	 accessibilityLevel={2}
 489	 >
 490	 Conseil de la Semaine 
 491	 </Text>
 492	 <Text 
 493	 style={styles.tipText}
 494	 accessibilityLabel="Conseil agricole de la semaine"
 495	 >
 496	 Surveillez l'indice NDVI de vos cultures via satellite. Un score inférieur à 0.4 indique un stress hydrique nécessitant une irrigation d'urgence.
 497	 </Text>
 498	 </View>
 499	 </ScrollView>
 500	 );
 501	}
 502	```

 505	## Services et Intégrations
 506	
 507	### Service Météo avec APIs Ouvertes (weatherService.ts)
 508	
 509	```typescript
 510	import { WEATHER_API_KEY, OPENEPI_BASE_URL } from '../utils/constants';
 511	
 512	export class WeatherService {
 513	 // Intégration Open-Meteo (gratuit, sans clé API)
 514	 static async getCurrentWeather(latitude: number, longitude: number) {
 515	 try {
 516	 const response = await fetch(
 517	 `https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=${latitude}&longitude=${longitude}&current=temperature_2m,relative_humidity_2m,precipitation,wind_speed_10m&daily=precipitation_sum,temperature_2m_max,temperature_2m_min&timezone=Africa/Ouagadougou`
 518	 );
 519	 
 520	 const data = await response.json();
 521	 return {
 522	 current: data.current,
 523	 daily: data.daily,
 524	 alerts: this.generateWeatherAlerts(data)
 525	 };
 526	 } catch (error) {
 527	 console.error('Erreur météo:', error);
 528	 throw new Error('Impossible de récupérer les données météo');
 529	 }
 530	 }
 531	
 532	 // Simulation données satellite NDVI
 533	 static async getNDVIData(latitude: number, longitude: number, dateRange: string) {
 534	 // Simulation basée sur Digital Earth Africa
 535	 const mockNDVI = Math.random() * (0.8 - 0.2) + 0.2; // Entre 0.2 et 0.8
 536	 
 537	 return {
 538	 ndvi: mockNDVI,
 539	 status: mockNDVI < 0.4 ? 'drought_risk' : mockNDVI > 0.7 ? 'healthy' : 'moderate',
 540	 date: new Date().toISOString(),
 541	 source: 'Digital Earth Africa (simulation)'
 542	 };
 543	 }
 544	
 545	 // Génération alertes intelligentes
 546	 static generateWeatherAlerts(weatherData: any) {
 547	 const alerts = [];
 548	 const current = weatherData.current;
 549	 
 550	 // Alerte sécheresse
 551	 if (current.precipitation < 1 && current.temperature_2m > 35) {
 552	 alerts.push({
 553	 type: 'drought',
 554	 severity: 'high',
 555	 title: 'Risque de Sécheresse',
 556	 description: `Température élevée (${current.temperature_2m}°C) et absence de pluie. Surveillez vos cultures.`,
 557	 actionRequired: true,
 558	 compensationTrigger: current.temperature_2m > 40
 559	 });
 560	 }
 561	
 562	 // Alerte inondation
 563	 if (current.precipitation > 50) {
 564	 alerts.push({
 565	 type: 'flood',
 566	 severity: 'medium',
 567	 title: 'Risque d\'Inondation',
 568	 description: `Précipitations importantes (${current.precipitation}mm). Protégez vos récoltes.`,
 569	 actionRequired: true,
 570	 compensationTrigger: current.precipitation > 100
 571	 });
 572	 }
 573	
 574	 return alerts;
 575	 }
 576	
 577	 // Calcul de risque climatique pour pricing
 578	 static calculateClimateRisk(location: any, cropType: string, historicalData?: any) {
 579	 const baseRisk = {
 580	 'maize': 0.6,
 581	 'cotton': 0.5,
 582	 'groundnut': 0.4,
 583	 'vegetables': 0.7
 584	 };
 585	
 586	 // Facteur régional (simulation)
 587	 const regionalFactors = {
 588	 'Sahel': 0.9, // Risque élevé sécheresse
 589	 'Sudan': 0.7, // Risque modéré
 590	 'Guinea': 0.5 // Risque faible
 591	 };
 592	
 593	 const cropRisk = baseRisk[cropType as keyof typeof baseRisk] || 0.6;
 594	 const regionRisk = regionalFactors['Sahel']; // Par défaut Sahel
 595	 
 596	 return Math.min(cropRisk * regionRisk, 1.0);
 597	 }
 598	}
 599	```
